about.details:
The company produces and sells cashews under the brand name Krishival Cashews. Incorporated in 2014, Empyrean Cashews Limited engages in the processing of raw cashew nuts into flavoured cashews.

Empyrean Cashews Limited offers products on the domestic market with a network of more than thirty (30) distributors across India. The company product portfolio includes different flavours of cashews such as salted, pepper, chilli and assorted - all offered in different grades and packaging formats.

The company products are available on Flipkart, Messho and India Mart.

Empyrean Cashews has processing and packaging units in Village Halkarni and Village Shinoli, Kolhapur, Maharashtra. The company also has one subsidiary namely, Siddhivinayak Cashew Industries Private Limited.

Competitive Strengths:

  1. Quality Assurance.
  2. Strategically located manufacturing facilities with state of the art infrastructure and integrated processing and packaging facilities.
  3. Customers' Satisfaction and their retention.
  4. Widespread distribution network and presence across various retail channels for timely delivery.
  5. Experienced and professional senior management team.

faqs.question: What is the Empyrean Cashews IPO?
faqs.answer:
Empyrean Cashews IPO is a SME IPO of 5247000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹19.41 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹37 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on March 21, 2022, and closes on March 23, 2022.

Purva Sharegistry India Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Empyrean Cashews IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Empyrean Cashews IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Empyrean Cashews IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Empyrean Cashews IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Empyrean Cashews IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Empyrean Cashews IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Empyrean Cashews IPO opens on March 21, 2022 and closes on March 23, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Empyrean Cashews IPO?
faqs.answer: Empyrean Cashews IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,11,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Empyrean Cashews IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Empyrean Cashews IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Empyrean Cashews IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Empyrean Cashews IPO will be done on Monday, March 28, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, March 30, 2022. Check the Empyrean Cashews IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Empyrean Cashews IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Empyrean Cashews IPO listing date is on Thursday, March 31, 2022.
